item.title: The Two-Way Street of Misunderstanding: A Look at the Double Empathy Problem
item.description: We all do it. We meet someone new, and our minds instantly begin sorting them into a box.

item.title: Tribal Tests: How Harsh Environments Expose a Lack of Wisdom
item.description: When we romanticize tribal life, we imagine close-knit communities guided by the serene wisdom of elders.
